Headline: #67 67th/69th/71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Jeffrey
ShortDescription: 67 67th/69th/71st buses are rerouted in both directions via 67th, Jeffrey, Marquette Drive, South Shore Drive and 67th, due to police activity near 67th/Jeffrey

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Jeffrey, Marquette Drive, South Shore Drive, then resume their normal route on 67th, due to police activity near 67th/Jeffrey.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #106 East 103rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 103rd/Woodlawn
ShortDescription: EB 106 East 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Cottage Grove, 111th, Woodlawn & 103rd, due to street blockage near 103rd/Woodlawn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #106 East 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Cottage Grove, 111th, Woodlawn, then resume their normal route on 103rd, due to street blockage near 103rd/Woodlawn.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
